description:
net/rpc: fix typo in documentation, clarify semantics of error return

Several of my students were confused by trying to use both the error
return and a reply return, so I figured it was worth explicitly clarifying
that returning an error overrides the reply.

messages.text:
On Friday, June 22, 2012 5:54:36 PM UTC-4, r...@golang.org wrote:
>
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go 
> File src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go (right): 
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go#newcode27 
>
> src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go:27<http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go#newcode27src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go:27>: 
> (In the future, these requirements may 
> soften for custom codecs.) 
> prefer this as is. 
>

Er, the current version is grammatically incorrect:  "In future, these". 
 Should I revert?

>
> : will not be sent back to the client. 
> looks like the indentation is different here. did you use tab or spaces? 
>
> http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/ 
>

Whoops - spaces.  Fixed to tabs and updated.  Thanks!

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go

http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go
File src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go#newcode27
src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go:27: (In the future, these requirements may soften for custom codecs.)
prefer this as is.

http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/4001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go#newcode33
src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go:33: will not be sent back to the client.
looks like the indentation is different here. did you use tab or spaces?

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=ef713d7587f2 ***

net/rpc: fix typo in documentation, clarify semantics of error return

Several of my students were confused by trying to use both the error
return and a reply return, so I figured it was worth explicitly clarifying
that returning an error overrides the reply.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051

Committer: Rob Pike <r@golang.org>

LGTM

http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/6001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go
File src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/6327051/diff/6001/src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go#newcode27
src/pkg/net/rpc/server.go:27: (In the future, these requirements may soften for custom codecs.)
ok, you can have the 'the'.
